valid_articles.Title: Microsoft to Help Users Remove Deepfake Nudes From Bing Image Search
valid_articles.Description: Microsoft partners with StopNCII to help people remove explicit images from Bing, whether they're real or AI. It's already taken action on 268,899 such images since a pilot begin earlier this year.
